plot: A man lies in the middle of the road. A car comes and almost runs him over. After the driver hurled abuse at him he offers him a job. The man meets his new seductive boss and is drawn into a triangle drama.
title: Offerlamm
plot_es: A man lies in the middle of the road. A car comes and almost runs him over. After the driver hurled abuse at him he offers him a job. The man meets his new seductive boss and is drawn into a triangle drama.
plot_en: A man lies in the middle of the road. A car comes and almost runs him over. After the driver hurled abuse at him he offers him a job. The man meets his new seductive boss and is drawn into a triangle drama.
